Sentencas: The effects of oxygen addition to methane directly supplied to solid oxide fuel cells were investigated.
Titulo: Experimental study of methane partial oxidation on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Fundamental experiments were conducted using Ni-YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) cermet as a typical anode material, and Ni-YSZ catalysts having different streamwise lengths were fabricated on YSZ flat plates.
Titulo: Experimental study of methane partial oxidation on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A premixed gas of methane, oxygen, nitrogen and steam was supplied to a test catalyst set in a rectangular test channel.
Titulo: Experimental study of methane partial oxidation on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The exhaust gas compositions and the surface temperature distributions of the test catalysts were measured.
Titulo: Experimental study of methane partial oxidation on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the oxidation of methane prominently proceeded near the upstream edge of the catalyst followed by steam/dry reforming reactions downstream.
Titulo: Experimental study of methane partial oxidation on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This resulted in the formation of a high-temperature region, leading to a large temperature gradient in the streamwise direction.
Titulo: Experimental study of methane partial oxidation on Ni-YSZ anode of solid oxide fuel cells
